title: AI and Data Science
description: Get to know AI and Data Science basics, their roles in software engineering, and how they transform technology.

quiz.question: What is Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
options: A field focused on teaching computers to perform tasks without human intervention
A method for sorting data to build models
A technique for manual data entry
quiz._answer: A field focused on teaching computers to perform tasks without human intervention

quiz.question: Which of the following is a typical application of Data Science?
What distinguishes Machine Learning (ML) from traditional AI?
options: ML learns from data, while AI follows pre-programmed rules
ML requires detailed instructions, while AI adapts on its own
ML is used for simpler tasks, while AI handles complex problems
ML needs no human input, while AI does
quiz._answer: ML learns from data, while AI follows pre-programmed rules

quiz.question: What role does a Data Scientist typically perform?
options: Building AI systems that can interact with users

quiz.question: Which skill is most important for an AI Engineer?
options: Good at coding and teaching computers to learn
Able to sort and analyze large datasets
quiz._answer: Good at coding and teaching computers to learn

quiz.question: Which of the following tasks is most suitable for AI?
options: Playing chess by following a set of predefined rules
Learning from large amounts of data to predict outcomes
Detecting patterns in data without pre-defined rules
quiz._answer: Playing chess by following a set of predefined rules

quiz.question: What is a common task for a Machine Learning Engineer?
options: Ensuring AI systems can process and understand large datasets
Designing algorithms that follow fixed rules
quiz._answer: Ensuring AI systems can process and understand large datasets

quiz.question: How does Machine Learning (ML) improve over time?
options: By continuously learning from new data
By adhering strictly to programmed rules
quiz._answer: By continuously learning from new data

quiz.question: Which role is responsible for building systems that can learn from data and make decisions?
